official_title: A joint resolution to designate 1988 as "Invest in the U.S.A. Year", and for other purposes.

summary.text: Designates 1988 as Invest in the U.S.A. Year. Requests the President to encourage the people of the United States to buy savings bonds and savings certificates of the United States. Declares that the Congress should actively support all U.S. savings bond programs.

titles.title: A joint resolution to designate 1988 as "Invest in the U.S.A. Year", and for other purposes.
